q: WCSI does the forensics on Mike Pence 's upcoming decision, and reports that he met with another Indiana Republican mentioned as a possible candidate: Sixth district Congressman Mike Pence says the conservative activists publicly lobbying him to run for president have already done so privately. Mike Pence says former Reagan administration attorney Ralph Benko advised him on the speech he delivered to the Detroit Economic Club after Thanksgiving, an address widely viewed as testing the waters for a White House bid. Benko and Former Kansas Congressman Jim Ryun are the only publicly named backers of the America's President Committee, which on Monday launched an online petition drive aimed at gathering" tens of thousands of signatures to urge Mike Pence to run for President. Mike Pence has been weighing whether to run for President or Governor, and says he intends to make a decision within the next couple of weeks. He isn't

is way more interesting than Simon Cowell and his nasty quips." We're a very sarcastic family," said Mia Tyler , a plus-sized model and Liv Tyler 's paternal half-sister. At an upscale hotel in Dallas Texas a top official in the city of Dallas gave the key to the city to Michael Vick . In a gushing like a school girl with a crush display he hands over the key to Michael Vick . On Monday morning the Mayor of Dallas demanded it back. The mayor states that the official did not have the authority or the permission

shake-up. Current Google CEO Eric Schmidt will serve as the company's executive chairman. Co-founder Sergey Brin will devote his time to strategic projects, in particular working on new products, the company said. We've been talking about how best to simplify our management structure and speed up decision making for a long time, Eric Schmidt said in a statement." By clarifying our individual roles we'll create clearer responsibility and accountability at the top of the company. In my clear opinion, Larry is ready to lead and I'm excited
